name: Battle City: 3D classic nes game
description:
Battle City 3D is a cartoon style square tanks battle game. Applying the next generation of 3D game engine, it perfectly restore the classic tank game play. You must feel familiar if you have played nes in your childhood.
The game has a lot of scene props , different props enable the player different ability. Up to 35 levels map, as the level ascension , the enemy will become more cunning and ferocity.
Classic game, a new interpretation. What are you waiting for ? Come quickly to operate tanks, to defend the castle!
The game control direction though a D-PAD, the pass condition was setted as all enemy tanks destroyed. all own tanks were destroyed or ruby was destroyed in the castle was setted as failure conditions .
